com.jdon.servicelocator.web
类 ServiceLocator

java.lang.Object
  com.jdon.servicelocator.web.ServiceLocator
所有已实现的接口：
org.picocontainer.Startable
public class ServiceLocator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Startable

This class is an implementation of the Service Locator pattern. It is used to looukup resources such as EJBHomes, JMS Destinations, etc. This implementation uses the "singleton" strategy and also the "caching" strategy. This implementation is intended to be used on the web tier and not on the ejb tier. registering with container.xml

getLocalHome

public javax.ejb.EJBLocalHome getLocalHome(java.lang.String jndiHomeName)
                                    throws ServiceLocatorException
will get the ejb Local home factory. If this ejb home factory has already been clients need to cast to the type of EJBHome they desire

返回：
the EJB Home corresponding to the homeName
抛出：
ServiceLocatorException

getRemoteHome

public javax.ejb.EJBHome getRemoteHome(java.lang.String jndiHomeName,
                                       java.lang.Class className)
                                throws ServiceLocatorException
will get the ejb Remote home factory. If this ejb home factory has already been clients need to cast to the type of EJBHome they desire

返回：
the EJB Home corresponding to the homeName
抛出：
ServiceLocatorException
